titles.title: Come, We that Love the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, we that love the Lord, And let our joys be known; Join in a song with sweet accord, And thus surround the throne.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Let those refuse to sing That never knew our God; But children of the heavenly King May speak their joys abroad.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The hill of Zion yields A thousand sacred sweets Before we reach the heavenly fields, Or walk the golden streets.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Then let our songs abound, And every tear be dry; We're marching thro' Immanuel's ground, To fairer worlds on high. Amen.
